description:
The mysterious girl identifies herself as Ki: she has the same name as the priestess of Ishitar, the late wife of King Gilgamesh. Ki tells Jil and the others that she can take them to the ‘Mythical Tower’. Jil believes this and starts to prepare for the journey, upsetting Fatina. Just then, Uragon, commander of the Golden Knights, who is after Ki appears before them. Uragon is determined to capture Ki, and will stop at nothing. It seems that there is no way Jil and his allies will be able to escape from the encirclement.
Source: crunchyroll
